name: Creature Cabin
description:
Creature Cabin is a RETRO, 8-bit, turn base, side-scrolling, horror survival, RPG. Play as the main hero who must survive through the night. Collect weapons, level up your stats, fight against zombies, creatures, and more! 

Featuring music from

KEVIN MACLEOD ARCHIVES

AZUREFLEX

ERIC SKIFF - ericskiff.com

JEREMY KORPAS

JOSHUEA MCLEAN - mrjoshuamclean.com

Z3R0

FREE PDF Manual and print out poster included! 

  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

Apple OS and Android ports are down the line.
